text: i'm originally from brazil and relocated
to ireland to work for aws
i was working as a solutions architect
when the opportunity came
i always wanted to have the experience
of living abroad while working for a
tech company but i never dreamed of
working for aws
my role is to support big corporations
in migrating their workloads to aws but
more specifically
to amazon managed services i guide them
both from a technical and an
architecture perspective
having a technical background especially
from a traditional data center culture
helped me understanding the customer
needs helping them
to translate those needs into solutions
is the key outside for my day-to-day
role
i help as a mentor for aspiring cloud
architects i'm also part of the
latinos at amazon affinity group
most exciting part of my job is seeing
discussions becoming solutions and
actionable items
with groundbreaking technologies that
launched so frequently been able to be
part of that
and contributed to it it's amazing aws
gave me an opportunity to live abroad
to learn new things every day but also
to provide to my family an amazing
experience
to open our minds to a global view which
changed our lives
